abilities.name: Abilities
abilities.description: Lesser Regenerate I: Regains 4 (d8) HP on each of its Turns unless it took damage it was Weak to in the last Round. It can’t be reduced below 1 HP except by damage it is Weak to. Sunlight Aversion: The troll’s Armor from [Natural] and Trollish Regeneration trait are suspended while it is in sunlight, and it is Burning (d6). If the troll dies within sunlight, it is turned to stone.
